full_summary:
=====================================

Food Preparation and Delivery Services
--------------------------------------

### Tender Details

| Field | Value | 
| --- | --- |
| Title | Food Preparation and Delivery Services |
| Reference Number | PW-22-01004024 |
| Amendment Number | 4 |
| Solicitation Number | CIC-155076 |
| Publication Date | 2022-08-11 |
| Tender Closing Date | 2022-09-07T14:00:00 |
| Amendment Date | 2022-09-06 |
| Tender Status | Expired |

### Description

Notice of Proposed Procurement (NPP). Citizenship and Immigration Canada, also known as Immigration, Refugees and Citizenship Canada (IRCC), is seeking bids for food preparation services, including delivery, for asylum seekers residing in temporary accommodations sites located in the Montreal metropolitan area.

### Bid Requirements

Bids must be submitted to IRCC within the specified closing date. Interested parties are invited to review the Request for Proposal (RFP) documents, available on the Buy and Sell website, and submit inquiries to Jasdeep Jande, Contracting Officer.

### Key Documents

| --- | --- |
| RFP Documents | https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/22/23214a164f38b589acbd0af9aa195bc7/cic-155076_-_amd_002.pdf |
| Pricing Schedule | https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/11/d8aa37abbed44e514be200c95eee782a/cic-155076_-_pricing_schedule_-_bareme_de_prix.xlsx |
| Periodic Usage Report | https://canadabuys.canada.ca/documents/pub/att/2022/08/11/5c089870de0713753f53eddcaf6004e7/periodic_usage_report_-_rapport_dutilisation_perodique.xlsx |

### Contact and Submission Information

**Contracting Officer:** Jasdeep Jande
**Email:** IRCC.BidsReceiving-Receptiondessoumissions.IRCC@cic.gc.ca
